title: Nails
summary: Manicure, pedicure, SPA procedures, broken and peeling nail treatments, express services.
description:
#### Expert nail care

Our nail care professionals are certified experts that sincerely love their work and never stop learning.

#### Certified premium materials

We never compromise on the quality of tools or materials, which makes our manicures flawless and long-lasting.

#### Safety is a priority

All our instruments go through a multiple-stage hospital-grade sterilisation and disinfection process and we only use disposable files.

#### Nails breaking or peeling off?

Our nail experts use modern proven ways to strengthen, restore, treat and align your nails. We can work even with the most difficult cases.

#### In a hurry?

Our staff will provide you with a “four-hands” or express manicure service: a perfect result twice as fast!
